comment:
I saw the first movie before all the huplah, and I still cut Amber Heard as a major actress mainly because she just can't act. Then I saw The Stand and the same thing. I had to erase her and her parts from my mind or I just couldn't swallow the entire Work(Series).
 So even before she was found to be a false person, a liar, and an unstable narcissistic abuser  Heard was ruining Art and hurting the efforts of other persons in the industry.
 I won't walk around the issue! I've dealt with and learned how to properly confront a Narcissistic Alcoholic Abuser. Install security cameras... They can't help but leak out their true nature due to their instability, consumption and perpetuating of lies.
 So now I have enough reasons to never watch anything she will ever be in. Just because you have "the face" doesn't mean you have "the ability".
 In the last year we've all been bombarded with Heards' pictures of her perfect life... Ummm... anyone else know someone that portrays being perfect, while being the Second(ish) most despicable person on the planet? Well you do now! She pretends to be perfect but parties her butt off so hard with her inner poss√©, and now has Elon Musks' kid?!?
 This woman will go to no ends to be your "Movie Star"... Be careful, we all know what a double edged sword Marilyn Monroe was.
 And Amber Heard is definitely in good company with that comparison.... She's nothing but a glamorous druggie concubine in the new era. üòÇ She doesn't even know what a joke she's made of herself which also shows her complete lack of character among all her other faults that add up to the same Warning!
 I certainly won't allow her to become a role model for my children... That's the least of what I can do. #BoycottAmberHeard till she's nothing but a bad memory. It's either that or allow her to FESTER in Hollywood. Or wherever else she sends one of her staged pictures from. The question is, does that side of twitter still support AH now evidence of her manipulations have come out and which group is more likely to watch an superhero movie.  Its a shame because I was really looking forward to watching Aquaman 2 and Fantastic Beasts but I will not financially support the double standard of WB and I am the type of person to go and see a movie multiple times in the cinema if I enjoy it.

comment:
The following could just be rumour but if true could explain why they haven‚Äôt fired AH yet- AH was asked to quit but refused & that AH has a contract that she cannot be fired unless she is charged with something.
